colti:
Technical operations projects series ; no.
            TO 520

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would increase the quantity
            of water for irrigation in two irrigation districts through
            the construction of additional dams and reconstruction of
            the canal systems. In the Region Lagunera District the
            irrigated area would be expanded from 52,660 hectares to
            approximately 85,000; in the San Juan del Rio District the
            increase would be from 5,400 hectares to approximately
            10,000. In addition, the project would regulate the water
            supply and reduce damage from floods; it would also reduce
            the construction or rehabilitation of 620 km of roads in the
            project areas. Adequate agricultural extension services,
            including demonstration programs and long, medium and
            short-term credit to farmers would be assured by the Government.
